CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The combination of the different electron - deficient units of pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione ( DPP ) and thieno [ 3,4- c]pyrrole-4,6-dione ( TPD ) can be ideal for producing broad light absorption due to the large difference between their electron - withdrawing strengths.

Let's think step by step.

1. pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione ( DPP )
2. thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione ( TPD )

Both DPP and TPD are identified as "Material Names" in the paragraph. They are specific types of organic compounds, identified by their structural formulas and common names.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione ( DPP )
2. thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione ( TPD )

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione ( DPP ) |
| thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione ( TPD ) |
